headline: Is Exelon Corporation (EXC) the Best Utility Stock to Buy According to Hedge Funds?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 12 Best Utility Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Exelon Corporation (NASDAQ:EXC) stands against the other utility stocks. headline: ComEd Receives National Recognition for Outstanding Storm Response
summary: CHICAGO, January 09, 2025--ComEd was recently recognized by the Edison Electric Institute (EEI) as a recipient of two Emergency Response Awards. The Emergency Recovery Award was presented to ComEd for its exemplary recovery efforts in response to severe weather that spawned more than 40 tornadoes in northern Illinois last July, and the Emergency Assistance Award was presented to ComEd in recognition of its assistance efforts restoring service to homes and businesses in the South following Hurric
